Html:
I grabbed the latest source and I used the database found in the app_data directory because obviously the scripts in the setup folder aren't up to date either
and  I get this... Help!

Invalid column name 'PluginsPath'.

Description: An unhandled exception occurred during the execution of the current web request. Please review the stack trace for more information about the error and where it originated in the code.

Exception Details: System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException: Invalid column name 'PluginsPath'.

Source Error: 

Line 30:                 select s;
Line 31: 
Line 32:             return projectSites(query).FirstOrDefault();
Line 33:         }
Line 34:


Source File: C:\Users\Dan\Downloads\oxite-32544\Oxite\Oxite.LinqToSqlDataProvider\SiteRepository.cs    Line: 32

Sorry about that. I thought I updated the MDF. I'll do that sometime this morning.

(sent from WinMo 6.1 phone)

From: dswatik <notifications@codeplex.com>
Sent: Friday, June 05, 2009 8:05 AM
To: Erik Porter <Erik.Porter@microsoft.com>
Subject: Invalid column name 'PluginsPath' [oxite:58580]

From: dswatik

I grabbed the latest source and I used the database found in the app_data directory because obviously the scripts in the setup folder aren't up to date either
and I get this... Help!

Invalid column name 'PluginsPath'.

Hello!
Please help please understand, how do i run Oxite?

Ошибка сервера в приложении '/'.

Не удается открыть базу данных "Oxite.Database", запрашиваемую именем входа. Не удалось выполнить вход.

Hello ErikPorter!
Today i downloaded oxite-33987. I something wrong, definitely.

When i installed Oxite 2009 3.2.15. i am, there is no problems, everything worked. Please help please understand.

It looks like you might not have a row in the oxite_Site table with a SiteName of Oxite in it.  Make sure you do.

Just remember though that the current checkins are work in progress so use them at your own risk.  They may be buggy.
